html:
11.1.20  3:08 am   Do you make the music or does the music make you?

      a little of both

11.1.20  2:09 am   What do you think about November ?

      the people's month

11.1.20  1:31 am   When is the proper time to consume potatoes?

      1:31 am

11.1.20  1:21 am   What's your favourite video game?

      making videos

11.1.20  12:11 am   what's the most wild thing that's happened to you?

      song writing





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

10.31.20  11:55 pm   but like think for this for a second, the spirit realm could be real?

      all realms are spirit

10.31.20  11:50 pm   What do you think about trees?

      effortlessly complicated

10.31.20  11:48 pm   You probably get this a lot but when do you think your next video is coming out?

      i could tell you what i think, but there is a risk i might be wrong, and be chastised for it. and if there's one thing i know about 2020 it's that i'm sick of being chastised

10.31.20  11:34 pm   Which video are you working on?

      one of the normal ones

10.31.20  9:38 pm   What are your thoughts on thinking?

      it's like another world, in your mind!

10.31.20  9:07 pm   how to do everything

      i'm not sure

10.31.20  9:06 pm   How creative is creative?

      1

10.31.20  8:40 pm   how bad was your old software 

      pretty good

10.31.20  8:22 pm   How to start making music?

      that's the one part i don't remember

10.31.20  7:55 pm   how do you feel about sitting down and writing lyrics without music to focus on the poetry of them? 

      i would be willing to do that for 1 lyric, if it's the title

10.31.20  6:48 pm   Thoughts on the state of iowa

      it's like ohio, with a twist

10.31.20  5:32 pm   Do you like candy corn?

     not very much

      Will you write a song about how you feel about candy corn?

     no

10.31.20  5:27 pm   we miss you when is your next video coming?

      pretty soon

10.31.20  5:14 pm   why do you use a lot of neon text?

      what the heck is neon text

10.31.20  4:44 pm   what type of stuff do you like doing now since the world shut down last march

      make videos and songs forever, and/or lay the groundwork for such an undertaking, to make sure that it i am doing it in a way that works well for me

10.31.20  4:19 pm   Favorite letter/character?

      space

10.31.20  3:01 pm   how long have you worked on the video?

      an unreasonable amount of time, considering it is NOT an unreasonably large video, nor is it the only video that i will do

10.31.20  1:49 pm   What is the meaning of music 

      it's you

10.31.20  12:59 pm   should i make art thats only possible for me to understand, or art thats made for the whole entire world?

      how about finding the sweet spot

10.31.20  12:00 pm   are you immortal?

      probably not, but i guess i'm open minded

10.31.20  11:10 am   are you gonna transform your songs to music videos?

      yes

10.31.20  11:01 am   Instead of asking you when your next video is coming out, what is the percentage of completion on your "big project".

     i'm doing an average, reasonable sized project, which i like to call 'making videos for the rest of my life'

     Like is it %50 done or whatever?   

     i don't think so

10.31.20  10:40 am   I've been having a chat with an AI chatbot and I asked it what question I should ask you and it said "what's the meaning of life?"
A pretty common question i suppose, but it has a whole other meaning coming from AI 

      either way, it seems parrot-like to me

10.31.20  10:04 am   what song blew your mind?

      all of them, i wish. actually, they all do, if i have the right mindset

10.31.20  9:04 am   What do you do when you don't have any good ideas for songs or videos? Also, happy halloween

      write down a medium idea, and then the one after that is usually better

10.31.20  9:03 am   do you like music?

      it's ok

10.31.20  8:12 am   what was your highest score in tetris

      all the way to the ceiling

10.31.20  7:35 am   what's a fun fact you can share??

      fiction

10.31.20  6:48 am   when will you make a new video?

      now

10.31.20  6:39 am   what kind of video are you working on? like the topic

      it's one of those songs where it has a music video also, to go along with the song. released as a video, and also as just the song so you can listen to it on-the-go if you prefer

10.31.20  4:29 am   how do you feel about fish?

      pretty good

10.31.20  2:29 am   Thoughts on the garfield movie?

      bill murray was in it by mistake

10.31.20  2:15 am   Where do you start as a music maker?

      the writing

10.31.20  1:18 am   like how big of a video are we talkin?

      currently the videos i'm talking about are ones of extreme average size

10.31.20  12:54 am   I just figured out that the chorus to "just did a bad thing" has chord progression Db+: ii-IV-I-V, and that the "bing, bong, bay ohh" is just a broken V chord. How do you make something so simple sound so refreshing, new, and inherently good? I'm really intrigued by your music.

      i think the answer, in this case, is to listen to at least 10,000 songs in the top 40 music charts throughout the past 200 years. then i think you will find that doing the type of stuff you described above will become as simple and joyful as a casual stroll through the park at breakfasttime. eventually you may even do it in your sleep

10.30.20  11:53 pm   What are your thoughts on electricity?

      i still haven't even figured out how to properly think about it

10.30.20  11:17 pm   How can I edit like you

      this may not be what you want to hear, but it might help to become a musician. editing sometimes benefits from an accute awareness of the flow of time, which is also essential for music

10.30.20  11:15 pm   How do you make the music feel like amzing feeling 

      i'm not sure

10.30.20  9:57 pm   Working as long as you do on projects, do you find yourself losing objectivity on what you're doing?

     yes

     Ever show unfinished things to other people to see what they think? 

     no

10.30.20  9:51 pm   what is existence

      could be you

10.30.20  9:34 pm   IN a perfect world, when would your next video come out?

      march 26, 2019

10.30.20  9:28 pm   How were you inspired to become a songwriter?

      i must have had some vague memory of some song that blew my mind, for at least part of it. so then i must have got the assumption that songs are supposed to blow your mind. so then i kept searching for a song that would blow my mind, and mostly not quite finding it. occasionally finding glimpses of it, maybe. but then eventually when i was strong enough i realized the inevitable which was to take matters in to my own hands. I should clarify, i've now come to realize that nearly every song already does blow my mind, but i just get extremely paranoid that it's not happening enough

10.30.20  9:24 pm   what do you think your next big move in life will be?

      making videos

10.30.20  7:36 pm   my mom asks: what city would you live in if you could live in any city in the world?

      there's probably gonna be some new ones

10.30.20  6:56 pm   have you ever considered an editing stream? i would like to see that very much 

      i am considering a much better version of that
